name: Epic Square Bros
description:
Made for the Geo- jam, the theme was switch.

A platformer with 2 squares

One can double jump (red)

And the other can wall jump (blue)

Every 6 seconds one of them will be controllable and the other will become a wall (switch) 

Try to get each square to the hexagon with the same color

As a bonus - do that as fast as you can

You can also skip to certain levels if you want

Pink platforms get destroyed if you touch them after the switch, so be careful!

Controls:

Buttons - mouse

W and UP to jump

A and LEFT to move left

D and RIGHT to move right

ESCAPE to pause and unpause (the R button is restart)

GOOD LUCK!
